findings.title: Potentially unlimited indemnification
findings.rationale: Indemnity obligations may be uncapped, which can expose you to costs far beyond the contract value.

3. TERM
This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.

4. INDEMNIFICATION
The Receiving Party shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Disclosing Party from and against all claims, losses, and damages, without limit, arising from any breach of this Agreement.

findings.title: One-way indemnification obligation
findings.rationale: Indemnification obligations that apply to only one party can create asymmetric risk exposure.

findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.

8. RENEWAL
This Agreement may be renewed by mutual written consent.

9. AUDIT RIGHTS
No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

10. LATE FEES
No late fees apply.

11. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by applicable law.

12. DEFINITIONS
Confidential Information means information marked as confidential.

This Agreement is executed on 2024-01-01.
